Content: The lawsuit pertaining to shooting and killing three persons and injuring another group during a demonstration that was staged demanding drinking water at Rathupaswala in Weliveriya, was summoned in the Gampaha Magistrate’s Court today. An attack was unleashed on the people of Rathupaswala who staged a protest in August 2013. Three persons were killed in this ordeal while several others sustained injuries. Four persons including Brig. DeshapriyaGunawardena have been indicted in relation to this incident. They appeared in the Gampaha Magistrate’s Court today. The Court ordered that the case be summoned again on April 05th as instructions of the Attorney General had not been received.
